ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EverQuest II Beta Screenshots
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the pix. EQ2 looks great. ... ===== http://www.ulm.edu/~chutto/hobby/ __________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? Yahoo! Mail - Helps protect
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the pix. EQ2 looks great.

--- Wulfric Rennison <wulftech@...> wrote:

> I somehow find myself lucky enough to be invited to play the Beta of
> EQ2. So I took some screenshots and posted them to my website to
> give everyone a sneak peek.
>
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000000.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000001.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000002.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000003.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000004.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000005.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000006.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000007.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000008.jpg
> http://www.wulfric.com/EQ2/EQ2_000009.jpg
>
>
> I have a few new ones of different NPCs and what not, but havent
> posted them. Hope you enjoy these.
>
> Wulfric
>
> PS My character on EQ2 is Raido. He's a wood elf priest. You will
> only be allowed to have 4 characters on EQ2.
>
>
